short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy-to-use settings page that allows developers to customize the look and behavior of the new tab extension to fit their needs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab extension that allows users to personalize their browsing experience by setting a custom background image, either by uploading their own or by choosing from a provided gallery. It also offers convenient links to frequently visited websites and a search bar for quick access. Additionally, it provides users with the ability to save their browsing sessions, and switch between them easily. Allowing users to organize their tabs and access them easily.
